class_descriptions.0: No significant indicators of psychiatric distress detected.
class_descriptions.1: Mild indicators detected. Consider self-care practices and monitoring.
class_descriptions.2: Moderate indicators detected. We recommend consulting with a mental health professional.
class_descriptions.3: Severe indicators detected. We strongly recommend seeking professional help immediately.

response_scale.1: Did not apply to me at all
response_scale.2: Applied to me to some degree, or some of the time
response_scale.3: Applied to me to a considerable degree, or a good part of the time
response_scale.4: Applied to me very much, or most of the time
